creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: bustling crowds of townspeople and travelers; prostitutes pulling on men; people carrying parcels and palanquins; people pulling horses; far L panels depict people sitting and eating, bathing, chatting, looking at pictures, smoking, and receiving massages
markings: URC far R screen: [Kiin jibin/kishi shikei]
signed: URC far R screen: [kojutsu chuka Baitei]
title: Scenes of Ōtsu
